=============
VCF Functions
=============

The VCF functions were developed to perform many of the operations typically used in population genetic analyses. Each of these functions were designed to perform a single operation (i.e. filtering, phasing, etc.) on a standard VCF, compressed VCF, or BCF.

Functions
---------
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   Functions/vcf_filter
   Functions/vcf_calc
   Functions/vcf_split
   Functions/vcf_phase
   Functions/four_gamete
